name: Spooksvale
description:
Story:

It is a dark Halloween night and Spooky has lost his teddy. Will you help him to find it and bring him back to his hut?

Game Info:

-> Engine: Unity

-> Developer:  Dahoon Games - Nimmda and Medehn

-> Assets: Made by Medehn

->Font: www.fontfabric.com - Slovic

This is officially our first game we made together, and the first using Unity! If you find glitches, flying trees or unobedient teddys - keep them, they will bring luck! ;)
